page.title: 10FARMING IN THE AREA
page.content: Housing developments cause problems to farms in our area because town people don't understand country life. The farmers complain that the public use their farmland to exercise their dogs. They also tip rubbish and vandalise farm property. Holly Tree farm is particularly affected as homes get closer each year as the Council are selling land for development. Nearly all the land is used for arable farming. Cereal crops are grown in most fields with Brassica(Rape) in others. Fertilizer is used instead of the rotation of crops. A small amount of land is cultivated grasssland and pasture. As far as we can make out there is only one small herd of dairy cattle in our area.
